inn1.comm: first up a good delivery, seems to move quite a bit. No shot offered from Amla.
another good one from Mortaza, no shot offered from Mortaza, quite chilly this morning in Benoni.
flicked away defensively but straight to midwicket.
driven off the back-foot to cover, still not off strike,
thickish outside edge down to third man to get the score off the zero mark.
another single for Smith, getting off the mark immediately to end the over.
first ball defended off the front foot.
defended once more
defended away to midwicket this time.
straight and right into Smith's prime area, his legs, but miss-timed
nudged away to square leg, Smith very strong off his legs, can't afford to bowl too straight to him.
defended off the back-foot, good over from Bangladesh again.
forward defence, Smith in a bit of discomfort as the ball bounced more than expected, hits him right on the gloves.
too straight again, thi time just glanced dwon to fine leg. Easy single.
no shot offered, that seemed to be quite quick and bouncy.
defended off the back-foot.
cut away behind point but down to third man. Just the single but a great shot still.
dot ball to end the over, Smith defends away to point.
dot ball to start the over off, driven off the back-foot to mid-off.
first boundary off the innings, edged away just past second slip, stayed very low this time, no bounce there.
dot ball to reply. Miss-cued cut shot.
punched out to mid-off.
defended staight to the bowler.
driven to mid-off, another dot to end the over.
jut too wide outside off, Smith runs the ball down to third man to tick over the scoreboard.
short and straight, tucked off the hip to long leg.
defended to mid-off off the back-foot.
short of a length and straight, goes across the line, misses and gets a shot on the body.
defended off the back-foot once more.
bouncer to end the over.
pushed out to mid-on this time, still a bit too straight from Rasel to Smith.
too straight again. Smith tucks it away to deep square leg. Walks a single.
driven to mid-on, rushes a single, but a fumble makes it all to easy,
front-foot defence.
tucked away to deep square leg again.
beautifull cover drive hit on the up, Amla times the ball to perfection and it races away to the fence.
pulled away first ball, fielder down there, but falls a short a safe distance, wasn't in control off that shot I would say.
play and miss.
pulled away powerfully, way too short this time from Mortaza, Smith rocks back onto the back-foot and pulls it just past mid-wicket.
dot ball to replay. Smith tucks the ball away to the leg side but straight to square leg.
way too short aain and pulled away with ease, timed even better this time. Excellent shot, you can't bowl short on this deck.
ooh, hit right on the box, that must have hurt.
flicked away through square leg by just using the wrists, well run though to get the second.
miss-timed drive straight to mid-off.
dropped down at deep square leg, Amla gets away with murder, pulled that one high and the fielder down at deep square makes a mess of it.
play and miss from Amla. Keeper takes a hit on the finger.
pulled away to long leg. Easy single to end the over.
tucked away to mid-wicket, well run by the openers to get another single.
flicked off the pads to deep square leg, just too straight again.
gets another easy single and keeps the board ticking over.
flicked straight to midwicket this time.
flicked down to long leg this time. Bangladesh still bowling too straight at Smith.
beautiful straight drive rushing past Amla at the non-striker's end, gentle half-volley gets the treatment.
little late-cut down to third man. Well played.
nudged away to square leg again. Rotating the strike quite well now.
square drive on the up. straight to point though.
rotating the strike again. third man comes in to play again.
way too straight again, right on his legs, flicked away past square leg and the ball races to the advertisement boards.
too full and straight again to SMith, lucky to get away with just the single out to midwicket.
well fielded at point, but not a well timed shot anyway, might have been one though.
timed better this time, cut away to deep extra cover.
quick single stolen straight to short forty-five on the off-side.
forward defence from Amla, well bowled.
cut out to deep extra cover again, just a single again though.
defended away to mid-off off the back-foot.
doesn't find the gap this time but hits it straight to cover.
driven to cover once more. Well-bowled by Rasel.
scooped away over midwicket, shouts of 'catch it' but nowhere near the fielder really.
cut away neatly down to third man.
dot ball to end the over as Smith misses an attempted cut.
flicked to midwicket.
over the top! Beautiful shot from Smith. Gives himself some room and goes traight over the umpire's head.
tucked away to midwicket, rotating the strike after hitting the boundary, good cricket.
pushed down to mid-off.
flicked to deep mid-wicket this time. Smith to retain the strike taking that single off the last ball of the over.
flicked straight to square leg.
forced away to cover, not timed well at all this time from Smith.
short and too straight one more. Smith pulls the ball away powerfully. Smith looking good first day back at the office.
gives himself some room the free the arms and cracked through the covers. Beautiful shot from the skipper.
dot ball is the reply to the double-boundary.
and another dot to end off the over, chopped straight to point this time around.
first ball is a wide down leg, that is the first extra off the innings
chopped away to deep etra cover
defended away.
short and pulled away beautifully! beats the fielder down at deep midwicket only just.
piushed away to mid-on
pushed out to cover this time bt in the gap and scampers another fairly easy single.
comes down the track, pushes the ball wide and short for the stumping, cut away to short forty five though.
cut away to deep point this time, in the air, but through the gap luckilly.
another single, pushed down to long on so they walk an easy one.
driven straight back to bowler. Ball holding up into the breeze it seems.
flicked into the gap at midwicket.
dot ball to end the over. Too straight again, but only flicked away to mid-wicket this time not finding the gap.
driven straight to mid-off this time.
angled away out to deep extra cover off the back-foot.
tapped out to midwicket, deep midwicket comes in and cuts it off.
another single
couple for the skipper, cut away and right through the hands of the fielder at point.
driven straight to mid-on again this time.
flicked away to square leg this time. Aother easy single, well-called.
driven of the back-foot, not finding the gap though.
driven off the back-foot once again, this time straighter though and goes down to long on.
late cut but straight to short forty-five on the offside.
driven down to long-on this time.
Well fielded down at deep point. Cuts the cut-shot down to two.
that brings up his half-century.
runs down to short forty-five.
that brings up the one hundred for South Africa.
cut away to deep extra cover.
tickled around the corner to short forty-five.
cut away beautifully past point and runs away to the fence. That brings Amla's half-century too.
attempted to play a delicate late-cut, lucky not to have edged that.
a dot ends the over. South Africa sailing smoothly here in Benoni.
too straight, flicked away to deep square leg.
driven down to long on.
worked away to deep midwicket.
Smith just flicks it with the wrists again. Out to deep square leg.
nother dot to end another over, Bangladesh going through the over's quite quickly with all the spinners in the attack.
oh no, another one, this time the skipper, Smith goes for the big slog over cow, Ashraful drops it at point. Not getting under the ball at all.
easy single nudged away.
tucked down to shortish third man.
missed flick to the leg side. Unlucky for Al Hasan, should've got a wicket this over.
flicked straight to mid-wicket.
drop-and-go from Smith, just nudging it away to the off and setting off for a quick single.
maximum! Amla goes over deep square. Fielder hand no real chance on the boundary.
cut away out to deep extra cover
defended straight back to the bowler to end the over.
driven straight back at the bowler.
pulled away powerfully through mid-wicket this time. Just too short and Amla pounces on that.
forward defence.
flicked away to deep square leg.
what a beautiful shot from the skipper. Comes down the track, flicks it over deep mid-wicket.
tickled away to long leg for single to end the over.
gone! Skipper goes, skipper catches. This time not making any mistake. Should've hit that higher. Smith's good innings comes to an end.
tickled away to square leg and Kallis off the mark.
cut away powerfully again. great timing from Amla.
worked aay to the deep cover region again, just a single though.
dot to end the over. defended by Kallis.
Driven down to long-on. Easy single.
tickled out to square leg, the man rushes in from the deep to cut it off.
cut away beautifully. Kallis finds the gap between gully and point.
driven down to long-off again.
tickled around the corner past short forty-five and deep square comes around to save the boundary.
cut away for an easy single.
just pushed to the off-side.
defended off the back-foot by Kallis.
driven out to the deep cover.
cut away to deep cover again.
driven down to long-on. Ending another good over.
driven down the ground out to long on.
forward defence
nudged away to deep extra cover.
driven down again, midwicket cuts it off.
driven down the ground again.
wide down leg
cut away to deep extra cover again.
flicked away to midwicket.
defended out to cover.
ticks the scoreboard over
defended back to the bowler.
cut to cover, well-fielded, no run this time.
flicked away to deep square. Just too straight
Nudged away for another single
beautiful cut-shot from Amla. Creeping up on his maiden ODI century.
ticks the board over
attempts to flick the ball away to the leg side, not making contact though.
driven down to long on.
flicked straight to midwicket.
Driven straight to mid-off. Good over thus far.
flicked with the wrists out to deep square. Keeps the strike taking the single off the last ball in the over.
flicked out to deep square leg again.
tickled away to deep square leg once again.
mess-up. Amla goes for the single, sent back quickly by Kallis. If that had hit, it was gone.
Keeps the strike again, only seven more needed, no well into the nervous-ninetees
flicked away to deep sqare leg again, that brings up the 50 patnership between Amla and Kallis.
good bounce and turn.
sliced away to point.
cut straight to cover.
forward defence. Good over comes to an end.
defended off the front-foot.
inside edge, drops down low and just beats the keeper.Runs away for a lucky boundary.
driven straight down the ground, gets another easy single.
flicked away to deep square leg.
smacked over cover, only gets two.
driven out to deep cover. Amla on strike, ninety-nine.
and that's it. beautiful innings from Amla, 100 from only 112 deliveries. Maiden ODI century.
comes down the track, smacks it high and handsome into the sight-screen.
short from the spinner and wide, Kallis slices it away past point. Another beautiful shot, Kallis getting 10 of two balls.
forward defence.
defended off the front-foot.
bouncy, flicked to square leg though.
attempted flick down leg only gets an edge onto his thoigh pad and scampers one.
bouncy again, raps him on the fingers, flies into the air but falls safely in no-man's-land.
dot to end the over.
play and miss, swinging at a wide one.
beautiful on-drive to deep midwicket.
wide down leg.
wide down leg once again.
worked away to mid-on
driven powerfully straight to cover.
short and straight, Kallis rocks on the back foot and pulls the ball away mightily.
driven out to deep cover.
driven straight to cover this time.
uneven bounce, quite bouncy again, chopped straight to point.
beautifull cover drive out to the deep.
pushed out to cover again.
driven out to deep cover this time, gets two and Kallis moves to fourty-eight.
Driven out to long-on.
gives himself some room and smacks it powerfully to deep cover.
Amla goes high and handsome over deep midwicket.
driven down the ground to deep cover.
only just misses his fifty, well-bowled by Razzak. Just spinning a bit less that Kallis expected. Goes through the gate and hits leg-stump.
Driven out to deep cover once more.
run down to third man.
beautifully stopped at midwicket.
driven down to long-off, De Villiers runs hard and gets an easy second. Excellent running.
driven to cover off the back-foot.
cut out to deep cover
just nudged away again for another single.
comes down the track and hits high and handsome into the sightscreen.
Amla cashing in now, this time a slog-sweep over deep midwicket, that went high and far!
cut away by De Villiers, races to the deep extra cover fence.
flicked away to deep square, gets it just wide enough from the fielders to come back for a third.
comes down the track and flicks the ball over mid-wicket.
guided down to third man and good running gets them two.
Amla goes for the big one over mid-wicket but hauls out 10metres from the fence. An excellent innings comes to an end.
run down to third man again, De Villiers to remain on strike.
quick single, well run by De Villiers
flicked down to fine leg.
forward defence.
comes down the track and smacked over long on. Gets to the pitch and flies it high and handsome.
cut away powerfully and beats the fielder at extra cover.
huge one over deep midwicket. Comes down the track and picks it up out of the middle of the bat.
right in the blockhole,well bowled by Rasel
driven through extra cover out to the deep, slower delivery, fullish and wide. Boucher waited well for that one.
close to a wide certainly ut just getting away with it.
right in the blockhole, punched down the ground to long off.
another one just not given wide, that should've been called a wide you have to think.
cramped for space, pushed out to cover.
very wide down leg, and a mess up with the running would've senn De Villiers gone if that had hit.
flicked outt to deep midwicket.
in the air but manages somehow to cut it right between gully and point.
that brings up the 300 for South Africa.
goes straight over the top, beautiful shot.
flicked past midwicket and they manage an easy couple.
well bowled, right up in the blockhole.
sliced away over the man at backward point. Good running gets them the third.
Boucher tries to go over midwicket, just not getting enough under that and hits it straight down the fielder's throaght.
driven straight to cover.
driven back to the bowler.
over the top again and that's 50 of 23 deliveries. Great clean ball-striking.
shortish and just outside off, cut away to deep cover.
miss-field in the covers. Just pushed off the front-foot.
smacked by Morkel, half-volley outside off and the gap is hit right in the middle.
quick single scampered. This time off the short forty-five, should not have been a single there.
smacked down the ground to long on.
cut over point to deep extra cover.
Morkel picks it up cleanly and slogs it over deep-midwicket.
pushed out to point, gets another easy single.
frustration for De Villiers, hitting it straight to deep cover again.
swept to deep square leg.
carved away over mid-wicket and runs away to the fence.
squeezed down to long on.
driven straight to cover, picking the fielders instead of the gaps is De Villiers
Picked the slower one, waited a bit longer and slogged it over deep mid-wicket.
One-bounce four straight over the top, full-toss miss timed,but still effective.
Another big one over the top. Smacked powerfully, that's a big one!

inn2.comm: Short and straight first up, good bounce from Steyn.
flicked away to square leg. Just too straight
short and straight again, solid backward defence.
short and just beats the outside edge, quick and bouncy, Boucher takes the ball about 2.3 metres from the ground.
wide down leg, bowled 25 wides in the first ODI did SOuth Africa, let's hope it will be much less today.
flicked down to fine leg, too straight again.
good line and length, a lot of swing too.
driven straight to cover, a half-volley to start off with.
too straight and full again, very gentle delivery, flicked away over midwicket.
straight again and full too. driven to midwicket.
half-volley again. Hammerd through the covers off the front-foot.
yet another half-volley! Beautiful on-drive and gets a free hit.
Short and wide of the freehit, not too smart from Louw, smacked flat-batted over mid-off.
driven through cover again. That's the sixth half-volley for the over.
once again Steyn goes too straight. Flicked to fine leg.
better delivery, defended off the backfoot.
gets off the mark.
short and straight, flicked down to fine leg but gats the top half of the bat on it and it flies away over fine leg fence.
Bouncer to reply
too straight again and flicked away.
first real good one from Louw, moving away from the batsman.
flicked to square leg again, too straight.
defended, much better, gets bounce after hitting the deck a bit harder.
what a ball, play and miss from KAyes.
full and wide, Iqbal gets a thick outside edge and the ball flies away to third man.
gives himself some room and pulls the ball over mid-on.
three in a row, too straight from Steyn this time and Iqbal just flicks it down to fine leg.
miss timed backfoot drive
gives himself some room again, just too much this time though, slower delivery.
Iqbal goes for the big pull over square leg, got a thick top edge and the ball just went straight up into the air, Duminy at square leg makes no mistake.
thick edge down to third man. Went for the big drive through the covers.
defended straight to point. Better bowling from Louw this over thus far.
defended off the backfoot. good length from Louw.
half-volley, driven, not timed,  gets away with a bad delivery.
slower ball. Not picked up by KAyes.
good over from Louw comes to an end.
short and straight, hit the bat right up on the handle.
short again, defended away to point this time.
bouncer, and a quick quick one at that. Siddique ducks underneath.
short and outside off, just fishing there outside the off-stump, swing and miss.
defended off the back-foot.
thick edge past gully and down to third man. A really good over that from Steyn.
thickish edge down to third man again,just passing the slips.
defended again. Good delivery from Louw.
cut down to third man
worked out to third man again.
another good over from Louw comes to an end.
short of a length and straight
driven to cover.
good pace and bounce from Steyn, swing and miss from Siddique.
short and straight again from Steyn, well-bowled.
play and miss from Kayes, swinging the ball away from the batsman.
good areas from Louw, defended to cover.
gets the ball to nip back quite a bit.
Louw gets the ball to swing away again, changing it up nicely here. Another good over comes to an end.
short of length and straight
same area, Siddque gong across the line and gets cramped for space.
straight up in the air, Steyn chases after it, but just can't get there altough he did get a hand to it.
attacking fiercly now, charging at everything, pulls that one away powerfully.
comes down the track again and smashes it right past mid-off
swing and miss, Siddique coming at everything now, lock and load.
defended off the back-foot, straight to point.
over the top, miss-timed though, only makes about halfway to the fence.
gets away with another one. Dropped by Louw but that was a  very difficult catch to take at long on having to run from mid-on.
inside edge runs down to fine leg.
that bounced... A lot! Boucher has to jump and take a full-strech take with one hand to get to that but does so sweetly.
defended off the frontfoot.
forward defence again.
bouncer, a bit harsh call that.
nudged down to third man but only gets to gully who makes a diving save.
inside edge hops down to fine leg for a walkable single.
edged! Goes right through the gap between gully and slip.
wide one but Kayes has a go at it, only hits the toe-end of the bat. and runs to slip.
cut straight to point, falls just short of De Villiers
edge! And sraight through that same gap again! Can you believe that?
bouncer to end the over off
short and straight, attempts to pull that but misses.
good line and length, hesitant to whether he wants to play at it or nor, in the end just les the bat hang outside off.
no shot offered this time.
too straight this time, flicked down to fine leg.
bouncer again, goes over Boucher.
runs down the track and tries to hit it out of the park. Only manages to miss it completely.
slower delivery, defended off the frontfoot.
atempted glance down to third man finds the hands of AB De Villiers at point.
short and straight, no shot offered.
defended confusedly of the back-foot. that bounced quite a bit.
pushed out to cover, De Villiers cuts it off.
runs down the track and smacks it past mid on.
bowled! First ball into the attack Botha takes a wicket. FLighted and full, dips just at the right moment and that went through bat and pads. Bowled through the gates.
full-toss straight back to botha
forward defence.
punched down to long off.
wristy punch down to long on this time.
forward defence. That's the end of a good first over from Botha.
defended off the frontfoot, god line and length from Morkel.
defended once again, but a slower delivery that.
wide called down leg
oh no. Another one . Wides are a big problem in the SA camp currently.
angled away down to third man but just gets the single.
Botha comes rushing in from the fence to save the second.
just too straight this time. flicked down to long leg, calls of two. Tey do manage to get them both in the end despite some great work done by Duminy.
forward defence.
thick edge down to third man, opening ball for Steyn's second spell didn't really bouncer, kept quite low.
good line and length. no shot offered.
thick edge down to third man once again. Only a single though this time.
huge appeal LBW but that seemed to be going down leg. And quite high too.
flicked away to fine leg and that brings up the 100.
driven straight to point.
defended of the frontfoot.
punched down the ground to long off.
dot ball once more as he defends.
attempted drive down the ground gets scooped up back to Botha who takes a very good low catch to his right.
end of another good Botha over.
good line and length from Steyn. No shot offered by Hasan, the new batsman.
good shape and movement away from the right-hander. Play and miss.
another one, beautiful shape getting the batsman to attempt a stroke at the ball.
another play and miss, same ball.
and another one of those stunners to end the over off.
flicked to midwicket.
overthrows, a bit unnecassary
forward defence.
punched down the ground for a single to end the over.
bouncer first up.
gives himself some room and has a swing at the ball ends up going to mid off.
well bowled. Bouncy
no shot offered once more, ood delivery though
another one in the right spot. swing and miss.
good comeback over by Morkel now comes to an end.
tickled to midwicket. Easy single.
attempted to play the ball over Boucher's head. No avail.
defended off the front-foot.
wide called again.
that ends another good over by the spinner.
swing and miss, well bowled by Morkel.
same thing, same result, but a bit too wide maybe.
aother wide down leg.
called wide again. Bouncer
another one. Thirteenth wide of the innings
short and straight,right into the body.
single to end of an over which included three straight wides.
defended off the front-foot.
wide down leg again. Oh dear.
flicked straight to midwicket.
flicked down to fine leg.
flicked straight to square leg.
driven straight back at Botha.
single down to long off.
a bit of intent again. Comes down the track, gives himself some room and wacks it over point.
mess-up with the running. That could've been out.
batsman going down leg to give himself soom room and Morkel pushes it beyond reach to the off
defended off the front-foot.
shocker, real shocker. Bouncer, down leg too.
gone, probably the worst way to be given out in cricket, driven straight back at the bowler who gets a hand on it and hits the stumps at the non-striker's end.
bouncer, not bouncing all that much though,did well to get under that.
defended back to the bowler.
defended once more, well bowled too.
driven back at the bowler.
a b it flighted, well bowled, driven to cover.
end of another good over.
driven straight to cover.
defended off the frontfoot
gets the ball through to deep cover. First time he has found that gap for quite a while
inside edge, nearly hits Boucher in the face off the bounce.
driven out to cover
good over from Duminy.
punched down to mid-on
heaved away right into the gap and rolls over deep midwicket fence.
gets a single out to cover off the leading edge.
tickled around the corner for an easy single
swing and miss as he tries to cut the ball away.
cut away to third man this time.
driven back to the bowler.
nudged away on the on side.
LBW, played all around it. Another wicket for Botha.
skyed a bit, but falls safely in no man's land
cut out to the deep and they runs two hard.
defended off the front-foot
guided in the direction of backward point.
flicked staight to midwicket.
punched down to long-off
defended to mid off.
tucked away to short leg.
defended to the bowler
driven back to the bowler.
flicked away to square leg and they scamper a quick single.
squeezed out to square leg
flicked away to square leg again.
beautiful cut-shot too deep cover.
bouncer, well-directed. Steyn looking quite quick again too.
beautifully bowled, play and miss.
forward defence, tentative, but effective.
defended again
bouncer again. Ducked underneath.
nudged down the ground for a single
driven back to the bowler.
cut away to point.
hits the thigh-pad.
driven strays to midwicket.
forward defence. Well-bowled Johan Botha
flicked away to the deep midwicket fence.
off the thigh-pad straight to Amla at short cover.
that has to be one of the biggest sixes of the tour so far. Short and straight and pulled away mightily. We need a new ball.
bouncer, over his head.
defended back to the bowler.
edged down to third man
end of a good over for the Bangladesh team.
flicked away to midwicket.
rapped on the pads, runs down to 3rd man.
defended of the front-foot.
dropped by De Villiers, very good effort though diving to his left at point.
defended back to the bowler.
cut away to point
bowled, Al Hasan chops it onto his stumps and that brings an end to a very frustrating innings for the South Africans.
no shot offered
bouncer, well-directed.
punched down the ground.
edged and taken! Steyn gets another on the last ball of his spell. Kallis makes no mistake.
defended away.
flicked out to long leg
no shot offered
well bowled, lots of bounce again.
another wide
defended off the back-foot.
turned around to leg gully
gone! Hauls out down at third man, went for the up and over but just went to close to Albie Morkel. He takes a good catch.
no shot offered
another wide
flicked away on the onside, Duminy does some good fielding to cut it off
run down to third man.
full and straigt, forward defence.
swings away at it, to no avail. Goes straight to mid on.
forward defence.
Another good delivery
full and straight, driven through the covers
noball this time. The extras are getting scary. 28 of them.
free hit straight to mid-off. Hit quite hard, but just not timed well.
swing and miss
driven down the ground but mid-on saves it.
no shot offered
pushed out to cover.
full and straight, inside edge onto the pads.
defended off the front-foot
gives himself some room and pulls the ball right through midwicket.
huge one straight over the top. That went a long long way.
in the blockhole, pushed out to cover.
shortish, bouncy, raps the gloves and just doesn't carry to point.
forward defence.
no shot offered this time.
smacked over cover, slower ball picked early.
follows the batsman down, not giving him any room.
just has a wild swing at the ball, skyes it down to third man but falls just short.
huge one! Big heave over cow-corner. Clearing deep midwicket by a long way.
driven straight to cover this time.
inventive attempt to go over fine leg, not working this time though.
worked down past short forty-five
pushed down to long on
tries to go over short forty-five again, not making contact.
gives himself some room and smacks the ball through cover
wild swing, might stand a better chance if he keeps his head down though.
pushed past mid-off
pulled away to deep square leg. Another boundary.
big shout for caught behind, not given though. Swing and miss
another swing and miss
pushed out to deep midwicket, gets the second easily.
big one over long-off. Another maximum!
swing and miss
punches the ball airbourne just to the left of the back-in-action skipper. He takes a good catch. Nine down.
square drive through the gap and runs away for another boundary.
a bit wide, but gets away with it. Last over to come
slower delivery, defended off the front-foot.
that's the end! Fine little edge through to Boucher to end this second ODI. South Africa have won convincingly. Please join us again for the third and final ODI on Wednesday at 14.30pm local time.
